content: **this cute little charm is perfect for adding a functional personal touch to your water bottle handle purse bookbag or anything else you like finished purse with this yarn and hook size will measure approx 5 wide by 3 tall but feel free to use any ww4/aran/10ply yarn you have on hand ** check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peeks free patterns & sales https //www reginapdesigns com/ if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/ ***materials *** yarn bee soft & sleek yarn approx 45 yds h 5 mm hook scissors needle 3/4 button optional ball bead keychain pom-pom ***abbreviations us terms *** skip = skip sts = stitches st = stitch sl= slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet* decrease = decrease worked 2 sts together into one st *this is a spiked stitch copyright 2025 regina p designs all rights reserved all content copyright and other rights reserved by regina p designs no content may be duplicated
